explains: adj. 非官方的；非正式的

sentences.en: Unofficial estimates put the figure at over two million.
sentences.cn: 非官方的估计数字为200万以上。

sentences.en: An unofficial grey market in the shares has been operating for about two weeks.
sentences.cn: 一个非官方的股票灰市已经运作了大约两个星期。

sentences.en: He assisted in unofficial ways with the routine legwork in various investigations.
sentences.cn: 他在多个调查中例行外勤以非正式的方式来进行协助。
